segments.text: I see the chaos unfolding quietly in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s focus on that plate is almost hypnotic, yet so misplaced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spilling over the sink is a glaring warning sign.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a surge of anger at the neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that stool is an accident waiting to happen, and I’m anxious just watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the girl’s outstretched hand is so hopeful, so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s strange how a single moment can be so full of life and yet so precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR
